channel.title: Help - Information regarding cache structure?
channel.description:
I have been searching over the internet for information regarding the structure of cache. This is so I can create a program to view the contents of the cache, hopefully this will lead to an editor and maybe one day a map creator.
If anyone has any information about the layout, of the cache please help me.

item.title: Help - Information regarding cache structure?
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

Vain_:

if you have the knowledge to write these programs then surely you have the knowledge to see how the client reads the data… you know, the same way everyone else did?

Read full topic
